short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the Teanglann.ie 'An Foclóirí' Irish language translation tool to any website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An Foclóirí turns every word on your webpage into a clickable link which leads to a search for that word on teanglann.ie. The links are opened in a small window beside the text so your users do not have to interrupt their reading.

Cuireann An Foclóirí ar chumas do chuid léitheoirí cliceáil ar fhocal ar bith sa téacs chun é a chuardach ar teanglann.ie. Osclaítear an cuardach i bhfuinneog bheag in aice an téacs sa treo nach gcuirfí isteach ar an léitheoreacht.

Make all words clickable links to teanglann.ie:
1. Go to a website in Irish
2. Click on the Teanglann icon
3. Click on any Irish word to see its translation!

Look-up single word
1. Highlight a word
2. Right click on highlighted word
3. Choose "Cuardaigh Focal" to see its translation on teanglann.ie

Please note, this extension is not officially supported by Foras na Gaeilge and they are not responsible for its maintenance. This was originally a personal project that I thought might be useful to others. I'm putting it online for the benefit of other Irish learners everywhere. Ádh mór ort! :)
